Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service, Post Office, and General Services

official_title: A bill to confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company to Ernest Pritchett and his wife, Dianna Pritchett.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Confirms a specified conveyance of real property in Jackson County, Oregon, that forms part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the California and Oregon Railroad Company. Declares to have been abandoned by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company, for purposes of Federal provisions regarding disposition of abandoned or forfeited railroad grants, certain real property in Coalinga, California, which forms part of the right-of-way granted by the United States to the Atlantic and Pacific Railroad Company.

titles.title: A bill to confirm a conveyance of certain real property by the Southern Pacific Transportation Company to Ernest Pritchett and his wife, Dianna Pritchett.
